meanings.definition: To bring together again after being apart.
meanings.sent1: The family will reunite for a special dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: After the long journey, the friends finally reunite at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were happy to reunite after being scattered around.
meanings.sent4: The rivers reunite in a beautiful confluence downstream.
meanings.sent5: The lost puppy and its owner reunite in a heartwarming moment.

meanings.definition: To come together again after being apart.
meanings.sent1: The classmates plan to reunite for a reunion next year.
meanings.sent2: The migrating birds will reunite in the warmer season.
meanings.sent3: The socks were thrilled to reunite in the laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: The broken pieces of the vase reunite in a skilled craftsman's hands.
meanings.sent5: The scattered clouds reunite to form a stunning sunset sky.
